columns.name: Borough
columns.description: Borough in which the playground is located.

columns.name: ClosureType
columns.description: Indicates the type of closure

columns.name: EditDate
columns.description: Date last edited

columns.name: GISpropNum
columns.description: This is the identification number for the property that contains the playground.

columns.name: OMPpropID
columns.description: Unique identification number for a property or portion of a property. In some cases – a standalone, smaller park for example – this number will be equivalent to the GIS Property Number. In other cases – a zone, playground or other site within a larger park – an additional designation of letters and/or numbers will be added.

columns.name: Red Sign Installed
columns.description: Indicates whether a red closed sign was installed

columns.name: Status
columns.description: Indicates whether the playground is still active and open to the public, has been closed to observe COVID-19 social distancing, has been reopened following COVID-19 closure, or is under construction.

columns.name: accessibility
columns.description: If a Children's Play Area (CPA), whether the play units associated with CPA are modified for accessibility to children with special physical needs.

columns.name: accessibilityLevel
columns.description: If a Children's Play Area (CPA), level of accessibility, ranging from 1-4.

top.item: Level 4: Accessible Playgrounds with Transfer Platforms and Ground Level Play Features
Level 2: Accessible Playgrounds with Ramped Play Equipment and Universally Accessible Swings
Level 3: Accessible Playgrounds with Universally Accessible Swings

columns.name: location
columns.description: Indicates the cross streets of where the playground is located.

cachedContents.largest: York Ave, E 91 St, E 92 St

top.item: Beechwood Ave., Crescent Ave. and Jersey St.
Fulton St., Truxton St., bet. Eastern Pkwy. and Van Sinderen Ave.
E. 148 St. bet. Morris Ave. and College Ave.
St. Raymond's Ave. bet. Odell St. and Purdy St.
W. 126 St. to W. 129 St., Amsterdam Ave. to Old Broadway
Glenwood Rd. between E. 100 St. and E. 101 St.
W. Brighton Ave. between W. 2 St. and W. 3 St.
Hoe Av bet. Aldus St and Westchester Av
Mosholu Parkway South bet. Bainbridge Ave. and Briggs Ave.
E. 42 St. bet. 1 Ave. and 2 Ave.
Belt Pkwy., Williams Court  bet. E. 12 St. and Homecrest Ave
E. 117 St. To E. 118 St., 1 Ave. To 2 Ave.
35 Ave. bet. Steinway St. and 41 St.

columns.name: name
columns.description: Indicates Playground Name

top.item: Tot Lot One Hundred And Twelve

columns.name: point
columns.description: Centroid (POINT) location of playground

columns.name: rules
columns.description: Rules posted on playground sign

top.item: Adults not allowed in some locations

columns.name: system
columns.description: Unique identifier for Childrens Play Areas (CPAs). If a System ID exists here, it can be used to join to the CPA dataset if the field is NULL that row does not correspond to a CPA. Records with NULL System IDs are most likely coming from Parks Properties and can be joined on GISPropNum.

columns.name: Approx Date Closed
columns.description: Approximate date playground closed because of Covid

columns.name: Approx Date Reopened
columns.description: Date playground reopened from Covid closure

columns.name: Community Board
columns.description: NYC Community Board

columns.name: District
columns.description: Name of the Parks maintenance district that contains the Playground.

fields.name: Agency

view.description:
In response to the COVID-19 pandemic, NYC Parks temporarily closed several amenities, including Playgrounds. This data collection contains the status of each Playground, and is subject to change. Although the data feed is refreshed daily, it may not reflect current conditions.

Data Dictionary:

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1aaYE82BS-SYh-xjI-t_oyJcNEPFWJNPfdI7T220-rv4/edit#gid=1499621902
view.emailShareUrl: mailto:?subject=Parks Closure Status Due to COVID-19: Playgrounds&body=Here is a dataset from NYC Open Data that I would like to share with you: https%3A%2F%2Fdata.cityofnewyork.us%2Fdataset%2FParks-Closure-Status-Due-to-COVID-19-Playgrounds%2Fa4qt-mpr5

Data Collection.Data Collection: NYC Parks Amenities Closure Status Due to COVID-19
